articles.author: Aamer Madhani
articles.title: Biden vows U.S. to act decisively if Russia invades Ukraine - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: President Joe Biden conferred on Sunday with Ukraine's leader over the Russian troop buildup near its border, promising that the U.S. and allies will act “decisively” if Russia further invades the Eastern European nation.
articles.content: WILMINGTON, Del. (AP) - President Joe Biden conferred on Sunday with Ukraine's leader over the Russian troop buildup near its border, promising that the U.S. and allies will act decisively if Russia … [+4315 chars]

articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: Europe coronavirus cases hit 100 million - The Manila Times
articles.description: PARIS: Europe has recorded over 100 million coronavirus cases, more than a third of all infections worldwide, since the start of the pandemic, an AFP tally showed on Saturday...
articles.content:
PARIS: Europe has recorded over 100 million coronavirus cases, more than a third of all infections worldwide, since the start of the pandemic, an AFP tally showed on Saturday (Sunday in Manila).
